mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_QNA (QNA_NO, MEMBER_NO , TITLE, CONTENT, OPEN_YN) VALUES (SEQ_QNA_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{title}, #{content}, #{openYn})
mapper.select: SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.ENROLL_DATE, M.NICK AS WRITER_NICK FROM MEMBER_QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE Q.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND Q.OPEN_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY Q.ENROLL_DATE DESC

SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.TITLE, Q.CONTENT, Q.ENROLL_DATE, M.NICK AS WRITER_NICK, NVL2(Q.ANSWER_YN, CASE WHEN Q.ANSWER_YN = 'N' THEN '미답변' ELSE Q.ANSWER END, '미답변') AS ANSWER FROM MEMBER_QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON Q.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE Q.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND Q.QNA_NO = #{qnaNo} ORDER BY Q.ENROLL_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER_QNA SET ANSWER = #{answer}, ANSWER_YN = 'Y' WHERE QNA_NO = #{qnaNo} AND ANSWER_YN = 'N'
